channel.title: Deceptive Ai on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Deceptive Ai on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 15, 2025
item.description: Draws parallels between AI ‘scheming’ and ape language experiments, exploring deceptive tendencies in LLMs and the need for advanced monitoring for AI safety.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 1, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on ‘Alignment Faking’ in Large Language Models (LLMs), exploring how models can superficially appear aligned while pursuing misaligned goals, and methods for detection and mitigation.
